text: @realDonaldTrump Can we please impeach Governor Cuomo for making NYS the highest tax state which was bankrupt before the Coronavirus and today he announced no money left to pay the many unemployed residents of NYS!  WTF is wrong with Democrat politicians!  Audit NYS !
